buff.description_key: You’ve been infected with the Z-Virus. Find some Anti-Viral Meds soon or you will die and turn
buff.tooltip_key: You've been infected with the Z virus

buff.description_key: The Z-Virus is spreading. Find some Anti-Viral Meds soon or you will die and turn
buff.tooltip_key: The Z-Virus has progressed to Stage 2

buff.description_key: You now have progressed to Stage 3 of the Z-Virus, find some Anti-Viral soon time is running out.(Wellness loss 0.25 every game hour/lose 25hp every 21 game hours max of 3 times)
buff.tooltip_key: The Z-Virus has progressed to Stage 3

buff.description_key: The Z-Virus is spreading through your body fast, if not treated with Anti-Virials soon you will die and turn.(Wellness loss 0.25 every game hour/lose 25hp every 8 game hours max of 3 times)
buff.tooltip_key: The Z-Virus has progressed to Stage 4

buff.description_key: Its grabbed a hold of you, get away!
You have gorged yourself to the point you can barely move
You are injured and limping. Heal up to feel better.
You are injured and limping. Heal up to feel better.
You feel energized
You dumped a drink on your head
You have Scube Gear equiped and can breath under water for a short time
Sleeping in a Sleepingbag warms you up.
buff.tooltip_key: You're resting in your warm bed.

buff.description_key: Sleeping in a bed moderately regenerates health and warms you up.
buff.tooltip_key: You're resting in your warm bed

buff.description_key: Sleeping in a bed moderately regenerates health and warms you up.
buff.tooltip_key: You're resting in your warm bed

buff.description_key: Your injury has become infected with a stage one infection, find some antibiotics soon or it may spred
Your infection is spreading, you need to treat it soon
buff.tooltip_key: Your infected wound is getting worse

buff.description_key: You stink of rotten flesh. The end is near.
buff.tooltip_key: Your infected is spreading the end is near

buff.description_key: You have died from you infection
buff.tooltip_key: You have died from you infection

buff.description_key: You were biten. You must cauterize the bite soon or you will catch the Z virus.

buff.tooltip_key: Thats going to leave a bruies
buff.description_key: You’re getting bruised up. The bruises will heal by themselves over time but you might want to be more careful.
You’ve gotten a small wound. Treat it with a bandage and be sure to change it when it gets dirty.
The wound hurts take some Painkillers for the pain
Your wound is bandaged and healing. Make sure to change it when it gets dirty so it does not get infected.
Your bandage is dirty and starting to smell. Change it with another Bandage soon or your wound could get worst
Your wound is bandaged and healing. Try not to get hurt so it will heal.
You’ve gotten a wound. Treat it with a First Aid Bandage and be sure to change it when it gets dirty.
Your wound is bandaged and healing. Make sure to change it when it gets dirty so it does not get infected.
Your bandage is dirty and starting to smell. Change it with another First Aid Bandage soon or your wound could get worst
Your wound is bandaged and healing. Try not to get hurt so it will heal.

buff.tooltip_key: You have gotten a severe wound
buff.description_key: You’ve gotten a sever wound. Treat it with Sanitized Bandage and be sure to change it when it gets dirty.
You have a large gash in your skin. You will need to use a suture kit to stitch it closed
Your wound is bandaged and healing. Make sure to change it when it gets dirty so it does not get infected.
Your bandage is dirty and starting to smell. Change it with another Sanitizing Bandage soon or your wound could get worst
Your wound is bandaged and healing. Try not to get hurt so it will heal.

buff.tooltip_key: You have a lot of scratches
buff.description_key: Twenty Scratches:Your cuts are infected.Use a First Aid Bandage to tend to your wound and remove two scratches or use a Sanitizing Bandage to clean your wound and remove five scratches for faster healing.
Your wound is bandaged and healing. Make sure to change it when it gets dirty so it does not get infected.
Your bandage is dirty and starting to smell. Change it with another Sanitizing Bandage soon or your wound could get worst
Your wound is bandaged and healing. Try not to get hurt so it will heal.

buff.tooltip_key: You have taken a Stimulant and feel good
buff.description_key: A nice rush of energy.

buff.tooltip_key: You have become addicted to Stimulants
buff.description_key: These pills really work be nice to have another.(Wellness loss 0.1 every 2 game hours)

buff.tooltip_key: You have become more addicted to Stimulants
buff.description_key: O Ya! I feel great!(Wellness loss 0.2 every 2 game hours)

buff.tooltip_key: You have become very addicted to Stimulants
buff.description_key: Wooo! Man I feel pumped. I need to find more of these.(Wellness loss 0.3 every 2 game hours)

buff.tooltip_key: You have entered Stimulant Withdrawl Stage 1
buff.description_key: I know if I could just find another Stim I would feel better.(Wellness loss 0.5 every 2 game hours)

buff.tooltip_key: You have entered Stimulant Withdrawl Stage 2
buff.description_key: I’ve gotta find me somemore Stims.(Wellness loss 0.8 every 2 game hours)

buff.tooltip_key: You have entered Stimulant Withdrawl Stage 3
buff.description_key: I’d do anything for a Stim right now!(Wellness loss 1 every 2 game hours)
You have used too many Antibiotics and have developed a resistant’s to them for 7 Days.
You’ve tripped an alarm!

buff.tooltip_key: You were caught in a Bear Trap. Free your self.
buff.description_key: You were caught in a Bear Trap and are bleeding badly.
A nice rush of energy
You have been shot with a sedative and are losing strength.

buff.tooltip_key: Ahh! Nothing better than a smoke
buff.description_key: You are enjoying a smoke.(Wellness loss 0.1 every game hour)
Vitamins make You feel a little stronger.(Wellness increase 0.2 every game hour)
You applied first aid and are now healing.
You are cured of venom poisoning.
You have been poisoned with venom.Use antivenom to heal yourself.

buff.tooltip_key: The poison is traveling to your heart
buff.description_key: Time is running out the poison is traveling to your heart.Use antivenom to heal yourself soon or you will die.(Welness loss 0.2 every game hour)

buff.tooltip_key: You are dieing from the poison
buff.description_key: The venom is killing you use antivenom soon or you will die.(Wellness loss 0.3 every game hour)
VenomPoisoning4Desc: The venom has reached your heart and taken your life.
You are on radiated soil.(Wellness loss 0.01)

buff.tooltip_key: He spit on you and it burns!
buff.description_key: Acid is melting your skin. Wash it off!
You are being electrocuted.MOVE!(Wellness loss 0.5)

buff.name: Cutted off
